Reviews.Title: Where is my Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Jin Ham
Reviews.Content: Today is the arrival date, however you guys didn't even ship it! where is it?!?You guys asked me to write a personal email to you guys so you don't get bad rating on your reviews guess what than answer my emails!If I don't get a confirmation date on when the item will come in front of my door by today I will cancel this order and let people know how bad of a customer service you guys have.Update I got my shippment on the First of April... Was mad about the late shippment but, the product is in good shape and works well.
